title: Mid-Columbia & Yakima Valley HS Football Scores - 10/9/15
text: Mid-Columbia & Yakima Valley HS Football Scores - 10/9/15 - SWX Right Now-Sports for Spokane, CdA, Tri-Cities, WA Member Center: Mid-Columbia & Yakima Valley HS Football Scores - 10/9/15 Posted: Ferris High School Saxons Headed to Seattle Saturday "We always tell the kids, don't think about things you can't control," said Ferris High School Football Coach Jim Sharkey, but sometimes that's easier said than done."I found myself saying, how are we going to get through this," he said. More >> "We always tell the kids, don't think about things you can't control," said Ferris High School Football Coach Jim Sharkey, but sometimes that's easier said than done."I found myself saying, how are we going to get through this," he said. More >> Updated: Thursday, August 27 2015 7:37 PM EDT 2015-08-27 23:37:27 GMT Coeur d'Alene vs. Skyline is one of six high school football games this week at the Kibbie Dome. While SWX plans to broadcast Friday night's high school football game between Lakeland and Lewiston, there are still plenty of other high school games that have been impacted by the poor air quality.
